home.title: Welcome to ATI2000
home.subtitle: Excellence in Manufacturing
home.description: Leading the industry with precision, innovation, and unwavering commitment to quality.
home.whyChooseUsSubtitle: Excellence in every detail, innovation in every solution
home.qualityText: Uncompromising standards in every product we deliver

company.title: Company Overview
company.aboutText: ATI2000 is a premier manufacturing company dedicated to delivering excellence in every product we create. With decades of experience and state-of-the-art facilities, we serve clients worldwide with precision and reliability.
company.missionText: To provide superior manufacturing solutions that exceed customer expectations while maintaining the highest standards of quality and innovation.
company.visionText: To be the global leader in manufacturing excellence, recognized for innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction.
company.customerText: Putting our clients' success at the heart of everything we do

equipment.title: Equipment & Facilities
equipment.subtitle: State-of-the-Art Manufacturing Infrastructure
equipment.description: Our facilities are equipped with the latest technology to ensure precision, efficiency, and quality in every project.

technology.title: Technology & Capabilities
technology.subtitle: Advanced Manufacturing Solutions
technology.description: We leverage cutting-edge technology and expertise to deliver exceptional results.
technology.precisionText: Advanced CNC machining and precision engineering
technology.qualityText: Rigorous testing and quality control processes
technology.customText: Tailored manufacturing solutions for unique requirements
technology.scaleText: From prototypes to large-scale production runs

clients.title: Clients & Partners
clients.subtitle: Trusted by Industry Leaders
clients.description: We are proud to serve a diverse range of clients across various industries.
clients.partnershipText: We are proud to partner with leading companies across various industries including automotive, aerospace, electronics, and medical devices.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to discuss your manufacturing needs.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you soon.
